ethulin manawa samaja sanhathika kulakayata subadayi widyarthin samajayata dayaka wiya.1970 maha mathiwaranayata shri lanka nidahas nidahas pakshayath samaga sandhana gatha wimata lanka samasamaja pakshayath,shri lankawe komiyunist pakshayath thiranaya kirimath samaga lankeya shishya wyaparaya wikalpa deshapalanayaka nawamu manpeth soyayannata wiya.ehi prathipalayak lesa 1965 rohana wijewirayange nayakathwayen bihi wu 'janatha wimukthi peramuna' kondesi wirahithawa pili ganimata lankeya shishya wyaparaya katayuthu kaleya. 1971 aprel 5 wanida deniyaya aashritha pradesha mul kotagena hata gath lankeya ithihasaye mulma bihisunu tharuna aragalayata janatha wimukthi peramuna peratu karagath lankeya shishya wyaparayada sahaya laba dima hethuwen ewakata pawathi sirimawo bandaranayaka agramathya thumiyage aanduwa shri jayawardhanapura wishwa widyalaya mulika karagena yam shishya mardanayak diyath kara bawa thathu danno danithi.emagin prathama wathawata merata rajya wishwa widyala paddhathiye shishya nayakayin thamangeth thama shishya sangam walath anagatha aarakshawa udesa 'nawaka shishya puhunuwak' diyath karannata aarambha kaleya.1978 kala wakawanuwen anathuruwa wiwrutha aarthika kramayath samaga merata rajya wishwa widyala paddhathiya thulata praweshaya labana shishyayinda wanijamaya aramunu wetha wegayen hambaayannan pirisak bawata pathwiya.eeth samaga uthuru kolambaa pudgalika waidya pitayak pihitu wimata juniyas richad jayawardhana mahathage aanduwa katayuthu yedimath samaga nawathath shishya aragalaka akmul merata jana samajaya thula mul basa gannata wiya.1987 deshapremi shishya wyaparaya lesin janatha wimukthi peramuna nawatha sanwidhanaya wannata wuye indu lanka giwisumen ratata sidu wannata yana ayahapatha pilibadawa kathikawak janathawa athara nirmanaya karamini. 1987-1990 wakawanuwa thuladi ranasinha premadasa palana kalaya thula dawantha shishya mardanayakda sidu wu bawa norahasaki.wasara gananawak rajaye wishwa widyala wasa dama thibuni.1993 wakawanuwa arambaune shishya wyaparayata yam subayayi kalaparichchedayak uda karamini.eheth ee wana witath shishya wyaparyata dawantha nayakayin pirisak ahimi wi thibuni.mema kalaya thuladi wishwa widyala paddhathiya thulata eksath jathika pakshaye,podu jana eksath peramune suwacha kikaru shishya kriyakarakam wardhanaya wemin pawathiyeya.
aleks fayarbanks shri lankawe upatha laba oostreliyawe wasaya karana ayek wana athara ohu me dakwa shri lankawedi pawathi kisidu tenis tharagawaliyak sandaha sahabhagi wi natha.

tharagayen jayagrahanaya wartha karannata santha josap kridakayin samath wuye 44-10k lesa lakunu 33ka paratharayak samangini.tharaga wartha sandaha piwisennashri lanka kanthawo shurathawaya dinathisupiri daskam dakwu shri lanka kantha sath samajika ragbi kandayama prathama warata borniyo sath samajika ragbi tharagawaliye shurathawaya dina ganimata samath wiya.puhunukaru sudath sampath mahathage shri lanka kandayama wisin thayilanthaya awasan maha tharagaye di lakunu 12-05k lesa parajaya karana ladi.

chithrapatiyata sangithaya laba di thibenne shri kanth dewa.
